title: President Donald J. Trump’s Efforts to Combat the Crisis at Our Southern Border Are Delivering Results – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Immigration	

Issued on:
October 8, 2019
We have taken very unprecedented action to stop the flow of illegal immigration.
						President Donald J. Trump					STEMMING THE SURGE OF ILLEGAL IMMIGRATION: President Donald J. Trump’s efforts to confront this crisis are delivering results. STEPPING UP TO SECURE THE BORDER: Though Congress has failed to act to address this crisis, President Trump has stepped up. COMMITTED TO STOPPING THIS CRISIS: While the President has achieved progress, we continue to face a dire crisis at our border due to Congressional Democrat-backed policies.
